title: 【Cashier Section】Reminder: The due date for paying the credit fees for the first semester of 2023 academic year is approaching.
author: 鄧瑞美
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 總務處出納組 - 鄧瑞美 - deng@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話03-8906366
對象： 全校學生
標題： 【Cashier Section】Reminder: The due date for paying the credit fees for the first semester of 2023 academic year is approaching.
日期： Thu, 26 Oct 2023 16:34:03 +0800

Dear students
Students can download credit fees payment form for the first semester of the academic year 2023 from the website of the Bank of Taiwan (https://school.bot.com.tw/ )

The credit fees for the first semester of the academic year 2023 can be paid from October 25 to November 8, 2023.

If you have questions regarding course selection, please contact Ms. Ta in Curriculum Division of Academic Affairs Office at 03-8906123.

If you have question regarding payment, please contact Ms. Deng in Cashier Disivion of General Affairs Office at 03-8906366.

Best regards,
The Cashier Disivion of the Office of General Affairs
